MoRTH vide OM No_ COVID-19/RoadMap/ JS(H)/2020 dated 3.6.2020 has issued Atmanirbhar Bharat: Relief for Contractors/Developers of Road Sector in view of the prevailing situation due to COVID-19 for immediate implementation by all concerned agencies. The same was circulated to NHAI officials for implementation vide NHAI Office Memorandum No. NHAI/COVID-19/RoadMap/CMD/202O(CN5788) dated 8th June 2020   (copy attached as Annex) .
